case.title: creative type looking for cute & querky elegent lady - m4w - 31 (London)
case.text:
Hello
Thanks for reading my ad. I'm 31, 5'2, cool, creative, easy going, inquisitive british indian guy.
Born and bred in London. Work in camden. Live in the east. Looking for a cool lady to hang out with. See films, random exploration of London life, go to exhibitions, be my muse, have a bit of fun, recommend books/films/music I should listen and be open to going to see bands/films and try different food out.
Whatever else happens on the dates, happens. I'd like to think I'm a bit of a free spirit.
Look forward to hearing from you. Send me a pic of yourself and I'll send one as well.
Cheers
